talk.utter: My name domain was actually stolen out of my GoDaddy account I really have no way to get it back.

talk.author: did:plc:ubhakguse5gp5bu43wmlkazo
talk.utter: Too many people here can’t seem to comprehend the inherent limitations of domain name “verification.” Your example is just one reason it’s not good enough.

talk.author: did:plc:gtcmsbmfyf66js27sswpa5oz
talk.utter:
Domain name is a horrible way to verify people anyone can buy a domain name with the name on it there's no verification process that it's you obviously because someone stole mine and is trying to sell it now..

And I'm the only me on the internet there is no other Kristine shockinger with a k. 

1/
